Interface OAuthRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Request

    public interface OAuthRequest
extends Request
    Extends Request to add OAuth specific
    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand

      • addOAuthParameter

        void addOAuthParameter(String key,
                     String value)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds an OAuth parameter to the request.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the parameter
        value - value of the parameter
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is not an OAuth parameter
